text:
Hi all, just wanting some advice on how to split a blog listing page. It's a single column blog and what I want to do is have the 5 latest blogs, then a container with a newsletter sign up form, then the rest of the blogs. For the top part I was thinking about using the blog_recent _posts function but then would tag filtering work on this and how would I make the bottom listing carry on with the rest of the listing from the latest 5?
So layout is:
• Latest five posts
• Sign up form
• Rest of the blog posts
Hey there - custom hubl is depreciated but it’s been replaced by just a standard module. So you should be able to build that functionality into a custom module
you can use the index of the loop to inject the signup module, then continue with the listings
